mapper.select: SELECT commentNumber, post_id, commentcontent, DATE_FORMAT(commentdatetime, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS commentdatetime, user_id FROM comments WHERE post_id = #{postid} ORDER BY CommentDatetime ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO comments (post_id, commentcontent, commentdatetime, user_id) VALUES (#{post_id}, #{commentcontent} , #{commentdatetime}, #{user_id});
mapper.select: select post_id, board_name, user_id, post_title, post_content, post_date, post_time, post_viewes from post
